flashcards.kikuyu: ũthĩaga wĩra kũ?
flashcards.english: where do you go to work?

flashcards.kikuyu: Nĩ ũkuuagwo nũ mbaathĩ?
flashcards.english: Are you transported by bus?

flashcards.kikuyu: Nĩ kũrĩ mũgithi?
flashcards.english: Is there a train?

flashcards.kikuyu: Nĩ ũkuuagwo nĩ bikibiki?
flashcards.english: Are you transported by motorbike?

flashcards.kikuyu: Rĩmwe na rĩmwe nĩ ũthĩaga na magũrũ
flashcards.english: Do you walk sometimes?

flashcards.kikuyu: Mũthua ngoro ti Mũthua Kũgũrũ
flashcards.english: Person with lame heart is not same as person with lame leg

flashcards.kikuyu: Rũciũ nĩ guo mũthenya
flashcards.english: Tomorrow is the day

flashcards.kikuyu: Mũthenya wa mũthia wa gũcenjania noti cia tene na noti njerũ
flashcards.english: The last day for exchanging old notes with new notes

flashcards.kikuyu: Kũrĩrĩkana atĩ noti icio ngũrũ ciagĩrĩirwo gũkorwo ciĩ noti baribarĩ
flashcards.english: It is said that those old notes should be loose notes

flashcards.kikuyu: ta mirioni magana merĩ na ikumi na mũgwanja
flashcards.english: about two hundred million and seventeen

flashcards.kikuyu: No kinyanagia na ũmũthĩ cĩcoketio makĩrĩa ma nuthu
flashcards.english: but up to today a little more than half have been returned

flashcards.kikuyu: Icio ingĩ cĩĩkũ?
flashcards.english: Where are the other (notes)?

flashcards.kikuyu: Cĩcokieĩ bengĩ ĩrĩa ĩrĩ hakuhi na we
flashcards.english: return them to the bank the one near you

flashcards.kikuyu: Ririkaniai cúcũ na Grandfather na guka na Grandfather matĩkarĩgĩe na marataathĩ
flashcards.english: Remind Grandmother and Grandfather so they do not end up with paper

flashcards.kikuyu: Wendente marangi marĩkũ?
flashcards.english: Which colors do you like?

flashcards.kikuyu: Ũmũthĩ cati yaku nĩ ya rangi ũrĩkũ?
flashcards.english: What is the colour of your shirt today?

flashcards.kikuyu: Wĩ na mũbuto wa rangi ũrĩkũ?
flashcards.english: What is the colour of your trousers?

flashcards.kikuyu: No wĩhumbe irinda itune?
flashcards.english: Would you wear a red dress?

flashcards.kikuyu: Kana wendete irinda rĩa rangi wa nyeni?
flashcards.english: Or do you like a green dress?

flashcards.kikuyu: Mũrata waku endete rangi ũrĩkũ?
flashcards.english: Which colour does your friend like?

flashcards.kikuyu: No ehumbe mũbuto wa gakararĩ?
flashcards.english: Would he/she wear a purple trouser?

flashcards.kikuyu: Nĩ ũrĩ thuti njirũ?
flashcards.english: Do you have a black suit?

flashcards.kikuyu: Mũhiki ehumbaga nguo njeru
flashcards.english: A bride wears white clothes

flashcards.kikuyu: Mũhikania no ehumbe rangi wo wothe
flashcards.english: A bride-groom can wear any colour

flashcards.kikuyu: Ũĩ marangi marĩkũ na rũthiomi rwa Gĩkũyũ?
flashcards.english: Which colours do you know in Kikuyu language?

flashcards.kikuyu: Mũtĩ ũrũngagwo ũrĩ mũnini
flashcards.english: A tree is straightened when young (when still a sapling)

flashcards.kikuyu: O rĩmwe thiia ĩkĩrũga na gũteng'era
flashcards.english: At once antelope jumped and ran

flashcards.kikuyu: gũthĩĩ kwanĩĩra ũhoro ũcio kũrĩ nyamũ ciothe
flashcards.english: to go to announce that news to all animals

flashcards.kikuyu: Nyamũ cĩarĩ na kĩeha kĩĩngĩ mũno
flashcards.english: The animals were sad, a lot of sadness

flashcards.kikuyu: Thĩia yahunjĩĩrĩe ũhoro wa ndwarĩ ya Wambũi Mĩcore bũrũriĩnĩ wothe
flashcards.english: Antelope preached about the illness of Zebra throughout the country

flashcards.kikuyu: no mũhaka Wambũi Mĩcore ĩkorwo ĩrĩ ya mbere kũrĩa, na ya mbere kũnyua maĩ
flashcards.english: Zebra must be the first to eat and first to drink water

flashcards.kikuyu: Mũrĩmũ waku ndũrabatara ndawa
flashcards.english: Your illness does not need medicine

flashcards.kikuyu: Wona weka ũrĩa ngũkwĩra nĩũkũhona
flashcards.english: If you do what I tell you you will get cured

flashcards.kikuyu: Ũtuko no mũhaka ũhurũke na thayo
flashcards.english: At night you must rest peacefully

flashcards.kikuyu: Gwakĩa, ũkorwo ũrĩ wa mbere kũrĩa nyeki, na ũkorwo ũrĩ wa mbere kũnyua maĩ ĩriainĩ
flashcards.english: At day break, be the first to eat grass, and be the first to drink water at the lake/pond
